elements.text:
A friend tells a funny joke and you start to laugh really hard. While you're laughing, you feel an uncomfortable tightness in your chest that you've never felt before. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: That's the funniest joke I've ever heard.
This tightness is really uncomfortable, but I know it's from laughing really hard.
I wish this feeling in my chest would go away, but I can stand it until it does.
